Welcome to my personal web site

Hello! This is my personal web site, where you can find some facts about my free software projects. My main interest is Linux and music software based on MIDI technology.

Thanks for visiting!

Member of

Linuxaudio.org is a not-for-profit consortium of libre software projects and artists, companies, institutions, organizations, and hardware vendors using Linux kernel-based systems and allied libre software for audio-related work.
